snippet.title: Pokémon Gold and Pokémon Silver make their return on the Virtual Console!
snippet.description:
http://bit.ly/2szXtAj
Rediscover the Johto region this fall! Pokémon Gold and Pokémon Silver make their return on the Virtual Console for the Nintendo 3DS family of systems on September 22, 2017. Visit our site for full details!

Official site: http://www.pokemon.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Pokemon
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/Pokemon
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/Pokemon
Tumblr: http://www.pokemon.tumblr.com
